title: EYL #144 Community Building, & The Music Industry with Brandon “Watts Stix” Bailey
itunes:title: EYL #144 Community Building, & The Music Industry with Brandon “Watts Stix” Bailey
description:
In episode 144 we spoke with a Los Angeles hometown hero. Brandon Salaam Bey Bailey aka Watts Stix is a community fixture in his hometown of Watts California. He recently received the key to the city of Watts. He’s a community leader, artist, and he has become a legend in Los Angeles for being the only person in the city to work with all four major sports teams for community improvement. He’s also a pioneer in creating krump dancing.


He’s responsible for working with the Clippers in putting up 16 basketball courts in Watts, he has partnered with Beyond Meat to do vegan food drives, and his nonprofit organization Thinkwatts foundation does weekly community give back initiatives for children and adults. 


In this Hometown Hero episode, we covered Stix’s path to community empowerment, we took a deep dive into how he was able to partner with so many companies, and we talked about the future of Watts. #LA #musicbusiness #communitywork 


EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com


Link to Investfest: https://investfest.com/


Host IG: https://instagram.com/earnyourleisure?utm_medium=copy_link


Guest IG: https://instagram.com/wattsstix?utm_medium=copy_link

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
